9a07e725-006d-4a1b-a55b-6d60a21bab66.name: Combat Reflexes
9a07e725-006d-4a1b-a55b-6d60a21bab66.notes: Never freeze; +6 on all IQ rolls to wake up or to recover from surprise or mental stun; Your side gets +1 to initiative rolls (+2 if you're the leader)

1918cd13-2921-4056-bd11-25a3fc46019a.notes: Usable once per hour of play

d9640bf3-7c1c-4a62-ae2a-0a3d587f46a7.notes: For equipment normally bought with money, each point gives goods worth up to 50% of the average campaign starting wealth (but never cash).

e42fbccc-389b-4df3-a3fa-4dcaa96fb8b3.name: Sympathy
e42fbccc-389b-4df3-a3fa-4dcaa96fb8b3.notes: Death of one party reduces the other to 0 HP

7007bb32-919a-453e-b5e0-7581aac6f64b.name: Sympathy
7007bb32-919a-453e-b5e0-7581aac6f64b.notes: Death of one party reduces the other to 0 HP and wounds affect ally but not you

4fb499ef-10f1-462d-8d2f-f09e4afe1f7a.name: Sympathy
4fb499ef-10f1-462d-8d2f-f09e4afe1f7a.notes: Death of one party kills the other

1f2e7bef-32f0-4552-8d86-849d5b8a5ba1.notes: Death of one party kills the other and wounds affect ally but not you

02c31144-f02f-44d6-af8f-d5df5955ddf1.name: Directional
02c31144-f02f-44d6-af8f-d5df5955ddf1.notes: @Direction: Back, Right, Left, Top or Underside@

8093e450-761d-4140-b857-3e70f401ee42.name: Tough Skin
8093e450-761d-4140-b857-3e70f401ee42.notes: Effects that just require skin contact or a scratch ignore this DR

18803a52-bec0-49a8-bf17-3a094c26f780.name: Fit
18803a52-bec0-49a8-bf17-3a094c26f780.notes: +1 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate (but not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

179c59c4-c37e-40e9-90dc-7edea0ea8d64.name: Fit, Very
179c59c4-c37e-40e9-90dc-7edea0ea8d64.notes: +2 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate; lose FP at half the normal rate (in both cases, not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

a293b03a-29bf-454e-a191-b8cba2682e04.name: High Pain Threshold
a293b03a-29bf-454e-a191-b8cba2682e04.notes: Never suffer shock penalties when injured; +3 on all HT rolls to avoid knockdown and stunning; +3 to resist torture

6f64849c-c5b6-48f1-973f-ac12c100d0e9.notes: Usable once per 30 minutes of play; Replace normal luck

88671e3f-1085-4d7e-924d-53c709f644d3.name: Bad Sight (Farsighted)
88671e3f-1085-4d7e-924d-53c709f644d3.notes: -6 to Vision rolls to spot items within 1 yd; -3 DX to any close manual task, including close combat

5f2a5c57-30ed-4691-9fc4-00f2a6dec734.name: Bad Sight (Nearsighted)
5f2a5c57-30ed-4691-9fc4-00f2a6dec734.notes: -6 to Vision rolls to spot items more than 1 yd away; -2 to all melee attacks; double actual distance to the target when calculating the range modifier for ranged attacks

3afed0b4-2901-4bca-81e4-2c3c388eda36.notes: Allows parrying two different attacks per turn, one with each hand.
